00148 inline FeatureVector FeatureVector::operator+ (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00149 {
00150     // Check if vectors have the same size
00151     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00152         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator+() : Size of vectors to sum must be equal");
00153 
00154 
00155     FeatureVector temp;
00156     
00157     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00158         temp.features_.at(i) = this->features_.at(i) + featureVector.features_.at(i);
00159     
00160     return temp;
00161 };

00164 inline FeatureVector FeatureVector::operator- (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00165 {
00166     // Check if vectors have the same size
00167     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00168         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator-() : Size of vectors to subtract must be equal");
00169 
00170     FeatureVector temp;
00171     temp.features_.reserve(this->size_);
00172 
00173     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00174         temp.features_.at(i) = this->features_.at(i) - featureVector.features_.at(i);
00175         
00176     return temp;
00177 };

00180 inline double FeatureVector::operator* (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00181 {
00182     // Check if vectors have the same size
00183     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00184         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator*() : Size of vectors to multiply must be equal");
00185 
00186     double result = 0.0;
00187     
00188     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00189         result += this->features_.at(i) * featureVector.features_.at(i);
00190         
00191     return result;
00192 };
